name: Cooking Randomness PLUS!
description:
This is the PLUS / Non-Jam Version of Cooking Randomness!

This version contains stuff that arent in the jam version such as:

-New Gamemodes

-New Gameplay Mechanics

-Visual Chances

-And More!

You are a chef trying to cook meals mean while you have to roll the dice that will determine your foods fresh.

Try to survive this randomness!
